name: NYT Campfin
tagline: A thin Python client for The New York Times Campaign Finance API
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### NYT Campfin

nytcampfin is a Python library for interacting with The New York Times Campaign Finance API. It provides simple Python containers, not full-fledged objects, for the API's JSON responses.
